description:
Chen Yehui is the guild leader of http://anidb.net/ch89129 [Excellent Era]. Though he applied to be a member of Excellent Era numerous times, he was rejected each time by http://anidb.net/ch89102 [Ye Xiu]. For this reason, he holds a personal grudge against the former captain.
Source: The King`s Avatar Wiki
name: Chen Yehui
